metadata.synopsis: Danthelon's Dancing Axe guard's dialog. Reacts to the general state in which we visit the shop, but also a line covering the case where we had a secret meeting below and it ended in bloodshed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main. From debug book Quest flags and options -> Act3 -> Danthelon Dancing Axe -> Add Jaheira as companion.Dialog with Jaheira starts, accept her as companion.Teleport to larian://bookmark?name=BGO_DanthelonDancingAxe&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=0.709298;50.450680;129.280289&camTarget=-0.058590;50.180027;129.860886Enter the shop, talk to guard.

0.speaker: Tairn
0.text: You break it, you - well, knowing Entharl, it was already broken.
0.context: NodeContext: A shop guard who starts the classic 'you break it you bought it' then cuts off to shrug and insult the boss instead.

1.speaker: Tairn
1.text: Sounds like you've left some bodies to bury. Plus side, Entharl pays overtime.

2.speaker: Tairn
2.text: I know he looks sketchy, but Entharl doesn't sell any shite. Throw him a few coins if you can - mainly so he can pay me.
